content:
# I've successfully harvested 5 units of stone, and my inventory now contains 12 wood and 5 stone. 
# With these resources, I can now craft a stone furnace.

# Next, I will proceed to craft the stone furnace using the resources I have gathered.

craft_item('stone_furnace', quantity=1)  # Craft one stone furnace
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting
